ARGH! I just realized I've been writing Soundwave instead of Smokescreen on 
occations. I just cought myself making that mistake. So, when I type 
Soundwave, I mean Smokescreen.

Sorry about that, Alloran, and thanx for bringing it to my attention.

::Ramulus::

Ramulus nods, smiling at the others' enthusiasm. He looks at Firearm. "You 
got the cloaking devices?"

Firearm nods in responce, producing a dozen cloaking devices from various 
compartments. Near him, Proto also takes out a few, the two bots putting the 
devices on the table. Ramulus takes one, snapping it onto his hip. He flips a 
switch to test it, dissapearing and then reapearing in a few seconds as he 
deactivates it.

"Good," he says, "Everyone take one, all of us, except for me, will be 
cloaked."

He looks around at the bots. "Is this all of us then?"
